package com.qa.testscripts;

import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.Keys;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.edge.EdgeDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver;

public class AmazonHomePage {

	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		WebDriver driver = null;
		
		//1.Chrome
		String browser1="Chrome";
		if(browser1.equalsIgnoreCase("Chrome")) {
			System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", "C:\\Users\\rajku\\Desktop\\Virtusa\\chromedriver.exe\\");
			driver=new ChromeDriver();
		}
		driver.manage().
		driver.manage().window().maximize();
		driver.get("https://www.google.com/");
		driver.findElement(By.name("q")).sendKeys("Amazon"+Keys.ENTER);
		driver.findElement(By.partialLinkText("Shop Online on Amazon - Get the best deals on Amazon")).click();
		driver.findElement(By.id("twotabsearchtextbox")).sendKeys("Iphone13"+Keys.ENTER);

		driver.navigate().back();
		driver.findElement(By.id("twotabsearchtextbox")).sendKeys("realme laptop"+Keys.ENTER);
		driver.navigate().back();
		driver.navigate().refresh();
		
		
		
		
		
		//2.Edge
		 String browser2="Edge";
		if(browser2.equalsIgnoreCase("Edge")) {
			System.setProperty("webdriver.edge.driver", "C:\\Users\\rajku\\Desktop\\Virtusa\\msedgedriver.exe");
			driver=new EdgeDriver();
		}

		driver.get("https://www.google.com/");
		driver.manage().window().maximize();
		driver.findElement(By.name("q")).sendKeys("Amazon"+Keys.ENTER);
		driver.findElement(By.partialLinkText("Shop Online on Amazon - Get the best deals on Amazon")).click();
		driver.findElement(By.id("twotabsearchtextbox")).sendKeys("books"+Keys.ENTER);
		driver.close(); 
		
		
		//3.FireFox
		String browser3="FireFox";
		if(browser3.equalsIgnoreCase("FireFox")) {
			System.setProperty("webdriver.gecko.driver", "C:\\Users\\rajku\\Desktop\\Virtusa\\geckodriver.exe");
			driver=new FirefoxDriver();
		}
		driver.manage().window().maximize();
		driver.get("https://www.google.com//");
		driver.findElement(By.name("q")).sendKeys("Amazon"+Keys.ENTER); 
		driver.findElement(By.xpath("/html/body/div[7]/div/div[11]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div/div/div[1]/div/div/div/div/div/div/div/div[1]/a/div")).click();
		driver.findElement(By.id("twotabsearchtextbox")).sendKeys("Iphone13"+Keys.ENTER);
		driver.close();
		

	}
}
